review: The Amazon fire tv stick offers the menu on the left (search,home, prime video, movies, etc) in a list . On the right side, there are horizontal bar. Contained in home section, on top your recent activity use of the apps, followed by featured app and games, prime originals and exclusives.it is a well designed stick that gives you tons of options and lots of app. Including twitch netflix and more. One thing I noticed they didn't have crunchyroll app. Unless I missed. Other than that its worth the buy
author: Manjeet Singh

review: Works great. My chromecast didn't work well in the bedroom upstairs but the fire TV stick works great. The remote is a great convenience over chromecast. Amazon prime video selection isnt that great right now, however having netflix on it makes up for that. The only thing I really miss from chromecast is the ability to chromecast from my PC to the TV. With fire TV stick I am limited to the apps on the stick.
